00047 void GenericDataHeaderUpdaterTest::UpdateFileIdTest()
00048 {
00049         std::string filename = "generic_update_fileid_test";
00050         CreateTestFile(filename, "");
00051 
00052         // Read in the file
00053         GenericData data;
00054         GenericFileReader reader;
00055         reader.SetFilename(filename);
00056         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.ReadHeader(data));
00057 
00058         // Get the file Id
00059         AffymetrixGuidType fileId = data.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->GetFileId();
00060 
00061         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fileId.length() > 0);
00062 
00063         // Update the 
00064         std::ofstream os;
00065         Fs::aptOpen(os, filename, std::ios::out|std::ios::binary|std::ios::in);
00066 
00067         AffymetrixGuidType newFileId = AffymetrixGuid::GenerateNewGuid();
00068         GenericDataHeader updateHdr;
00069         updateHdr.SetFileId(newFileId);
00070 
00071         GenericDataHeaderUpdater updater;
00072         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(updater.Update(os, updateHdr, *data.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()));
00073 
00074         os.close();
00075 
00076         // Now read the file again.
00077         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.ReadHeader(data));
00078 
00079         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->GetFileId() == newFileId);
00080         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->GetFileTypeId() == "funky file");
00081 }
00082 
00083 void GenericDataHeaderUpdaterTest::CreateTestFile(const std::string& name, const std::string& fileId)
00084 {
00085         FileHeader fh;
00086         fh.SetFilename(name);
00087         fh.GetGenericDataHdr()->SetFileTypeId("funky file");
00088 
00089         if (fileId.length() != 0)
00090                 fh.GetGenericDataHdr()->SetFileId(fileId);
00091 
00092         GenericFileWriter writer(&fh);
00093         writer.WriteHeader();
00094 }
00095 
00096 void GenericDataHeaderUpdaterTest::UpdateFileIdFailTest()
00097 {
00098         std::string filename = "generic_update_fileid_test";
00099         CreateTestFile(filename, "fake file id");
00100 
00101         // Read in the file
00102         GenericData data;
00103         GenericFileReader reader;
00104         reader.SetFilename(filename);
00105         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.ReadHeader(data));
00106 
00107         // Get the file Id
00108         AffymetrixGuidType fileId = data.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->GetFileId();
00109 
00110         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fileId == "fake file id");
00111 
00112         // Update the 
00113         std::ofstream os;
00114         Fs::aptOpen(os, filename, std::ios::out|std::ios::binary|std::ios::in);
00115 
00116         AffymetrixGuidType newFileId = AffymetrixGuid::GenerateNewGuid();
00117         GenericDataHeader updateHdr;
00118         updateHdr.SetFileId(newFileId);
00119 
00120         // Should not update unless the current and new file ids are the same length.
00121         GenericDataHeaderUpdater updater;
00122         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(updater.Update(os, updateHdr, *data.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()) == false);
00123 
00124         os.close();
00125 }

00127 void GenericDataHeaderUpdaterTest::CreateTestFileWithParameters(const std::string& name)
00128 {
00129         FileHeader fh;
00130         fh.SetFilename(name);
00131         fh.GetGenericDataHdr()->SetFileTypeId("funky file");
00132         fh.GetGenericDataHdr()->SetFileCreationTime(DateTime::GetCurrentDateTime().ToString());
00133 
00134         ParameterNameValueType nvt;
00135         nvt.SetName(L"Float");
00136         nvt.SetValueFloat(4.5f);
00137         fh.GetGenericDataHdr()->AddNameValParam(nvt);
00138         nvt.SetName(L"String");
00139         nvt.SetValueText(L"not updatable");
00140         fh.GetGenericDataHdr()->AddNameValParam(nvt);
00141         nvt.SetName(L"Integer");
00142         nvt.SetValueInt32(56);
00143         fh.GetGenericDataHdr()->AddNameValParam(nvt);
00144 
00145         GenericFileWriter writer(&fh);
00146         writer.WriteHeader();
00147 }
00148 
00149 void GenericDataHeaderUpdaterTest::UpdateMatchingParameterTest()
00150 {
00151         std::string filename = "generic_update_parameter_test1";
00152         CreateTestFileWithParameters(filename);
00153 
00154         // Read in the file
00155         GenericData data;
00156         GenericFileReader reader;
00157         reader.SetFilename(filename);
00158         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.ReadHeader(data));
00159 
00160         ParameterNameValueType nvt1;
00161         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->FindNameValParam(L"String", nvt1));
00162         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt1.GetValueText() == L"not updatable");
00163         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->FindNameValParam(L"Float", nvt1));
00164         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt1.GetValueFloat() == 4.5f);
00165         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->FindNameValParam(L"Integer", nvt1));
00166         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt1.GetValueInt32() == 56);
00167 
00168         // Update the parameter list
00169         std::ofstream os;
00170         Fs::aptOpen(os, filename, std::ios::out|std::ios::binary|std::ios::in);
00171 
00172         AffymetrixGuidType newFileId = AffymetrixGuid::GenerateNewGuid();
00173         GenericDataHeader updateHdr;
00174         updateHdr.SetFileId(newFileId);
00175         ParameterNameValueType nvt2;
00176         nvt2.SetName(L"Float");
00177         nvt2.SetValueFloat(5.7f);
00178         updateHdr.AddNameValParam(nvt2);
00179         nvt2.SetName(L"String");
00180         nvt2.SetValueText(L"updatable");
00181         updateHdr.AddNameValParam(nvt2);
00182         nvt2.SetName(L"Integer");
00183         nvt2.SetValueInt32(112);
00184         updateHdr.AddNameValParam(nvt2);
00185 
00186         GenericDataHeaderUpdater updater;
00187         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(updater.Update(os, updateHdr, *data.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()));
00188 
00189         os.close();
00190 
00191         // Now read the file again.
00192         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.ReadHeader(data));
00193 
00194         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->GetFileId() == newFileId);
00195 
00196         ParameterNameValueType nvt3;
00197         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->FindNameValParam(L"String", nvt3));
00198         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt3.GetValueText() == L"updatable");    // the string is shorter so it can be updated.
00199         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->FindNameValParam(L"Float", nvt3));
00200         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt3.GetValueFloat() == 5.7f);
00201         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->FindNameValParam(L"Integer", nvt3));
00202         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt3.GetValueInt32() == 112);
00203 }
00204 
00205 void GenericDataHeaderUpdaterTest::UpdateNonMatchingParamterTest()
00206 {
00207         std::string filename = "generic_update_parameter_test2";
00208         CreateTestFileWithParameters(filename);
00209 
00210         // Read in the file
00211         GenericData data;
00212         GenericFileReader reader;
00213         reader.SetFilename(filename);
00214         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.ReadHeader(data));
00215 
00216         ParameterNameValueType nvt1;
00217         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->FindNameValParam(L"String", nvt1));
00218         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt1.GetValueText() == L"not updatable");
00219         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->FindNameValParam(L"Float", nvt1));
00220         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt1.GetValueFloat() == 4.5f);
00221         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->FindNameValParam(L"Integer", nvt1));
00222         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt1.GetValueInt32() == 56);
00223 
00224         // Update the parameter list
00225         std::ofstream os;
00226         Fs::aptOpen(os, filename, std::ios::out|std::ios::binary|std::ios::in);
00227 
00228         AffymetrixGuidType newFileId = AffymetrixGuid::GenerateNewGuid();
00229         GenericDataHeader updateHdr;
00230         updateHdr.SetFileId(newFileId);
00231         ParameterNameValueType nvt2;
00232         nvt2.SetName(L"Float");
00233         nvt2.SetValueInt32(57);
00234         updateHdr.AddNameValParam(nvt2);
00235         nvt2.SetName(L"String");
00236         nvt2.SetValueText(L"really not updatable");
00237         updateHdr.AddNameValParam(nvt2);
00238         nvt2.SetName(L"Integer");
00239         nvt2.SetValueInt16(112);
00240         updateHdr.AddNameValParam(nvt2);
00241 
00242         GenericDataHeaderUpdater updater;
00243         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(updater.Update(os, updateHdr, *data.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()));
00244 
00245         os.close();
00246 
00247         // Now read the file again.
00248         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.ReadHeader(data));
00249 
00250         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->GetFileId() == newFileId);
00251 
00252         ParameterNameValueType nvt3;
00253         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->FindNameValParam(L"String", nvt3));
00254         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt3.GetValueText() == L"not updatable");
00255         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->FindNameValParam(L"Float", nvt3));
00256         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt3.GetValueFloat() == 4.5f);
00257         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->FindNameValParam(L"Integer", nvt3));
00258         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt3.GetValueInt32() == 56);
00259 }
